alert.note: Alert for Botetourt; Roanoke (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:29PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Roanoke and southern Botetourt Counties and the northeastern portion of the City of Roanoke through 300 PM EDT... At 228 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Vinton, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roanoke... Vinton... Blue Ridge... Cloverdale... Laymantown... and Hollins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
